message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL 

The paper deals with the task of effectively making sense of short texts, which is a common problem in natural language processing. The proposed solution involves using a deep memory network to automatically expand short texts with relevant information from a collection of longer documents. This task falls under the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and deep learning (cs.DL).
